de.devbliss.apitester

Class Patcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.devbliss.apitester.Patcher

  • public class Patcher
extends Object
    Contains static methods to perform PATCH requests. If you want to make more requests in a series sharing the same TestState and using the same PatchFactory, consider using ApiTest which is wrapping that stuff for you.
    Author:
    mbankmann
